channel.title: Yonder on KS now!
channel.description:
[![](upload://6JqMdIq8pSJuXvd36pfXwCCxgkd.jpeg)](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/frasersimons/yonder-a-fantasy-tabletop-roleplaying-game?ref=user_menu) ![](upload://9eWtmFCL46TFzJMIWE27T1YicDM.jpeg)
[Fraser's got his newest project up for crowdfunding on kickstarter](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/frasersimons/yonder-a-fantasy-tabletop-roleplaying-game?ref=user_menu). It's all refugees fleeing a cataclysm into a magical world that changes them as they reveal their inner nature is now live and uses the system he developed for Retropunk. Check it out!
![](upload://hX6aIGaUO5PeAwe8vlXykvOI7dh.jpeg)
